thread.title: BRIEF-W. R. Grace & Co Says Entered Into Credit Agreement Whereby The Credit Agreement Provides For New Senior Secured Credit Facilities

title: BRIEF-W. R. Grace & Co Says Entered Into Credit Agreement Whereby The Credit Agreement Provides For New Senior Secured Credit Facilities

organizations.name: new senior secured credit facilities reuters staff

text:
Market News April 3, 2018 / 9:08 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-W. R. Grace & Co Says Entered Into Credit Agreement Whereby The Credit Agreement Provides For New Senior Secured Credit Facilities Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 4 (Reuters) - W. R. Grace & Co: 
* W. R. GRACE & CO - ENTERED INTO CREDIT AGREEMENT WHEREBY THE CREDIT AGREEMENT PROVIDES FOR NEW SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITIES - SEC FILING 
* W. R. GRACE & CO - THE NEW SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITIES HAS 7-YR TERM LOAN FACILITY OF $950 MLN & 5-YR $400 MLN REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY Source text: ( bit.ly/2GTpKeS ) Further company coverage:
